Detailed Description

Class DataConnManager implements a singleton that manages data connections of any type (e.g. circuit switched, packet switched, or serial).

Member Function Documentation

DataConnManager & DataConnManager::Get (   )  [static]
 

Returns the reference to the data connection manager singleton.

DataConn & DataConnManager::GetDataConn (  DataConnProfileId  id  ) 
 

Returns a reference to the data connection with the specified data connection profile id. This method must only be called for data connections that are currently registered, otherwise an assertion holds.

Returns:
Reference to the specified data connection.
See also:
RegisterDataConn

const DataConn & DataConnManager::GetDataConn (  DataConnProfileId  id  )  const
 

Returns a constant reference to the data connection with the specified data connection profile id. This method must only be called for data connections that are currently registered, otherwise an assertion holds.

Returns:
Constant reference to the specified data connection.
See also:
RegisterDataConn

DataConnPtr DataConnManager::GetDataConnByIdx (  UINT  idx  )  const
 

This method is used to enumerate the currently registered data connections. E.g., if there are n data connections active, then the index may range from 0 to n - 1. If idx is too high, the empty smart pointer is returned.

DataConnPtr DataConnManager::GetDataConnByIdxAndType (  UINT  idx,
DataConnProfile::ProfileType  type
)  const
 

This method is used to enumerate the currently registered data connections of type. E.g., if there are n data connections of some type active, then the index may range from 0 to n - 1. If idx is too high, the empty smart pointer is returned.

UINT DataConnManager::GetDataConnCount (  DataConnProfile::ProfileType  type  )  const
 

Returns the number of existing data connections of the specified type.

UINT DataConnManager::GetDataConnCount (   )  const
 

Returns the number of existing data connections.

BOOLEAN DataConnManager::IsDataConnRegistered (  DataConnProfileId  id  )  const
 

Tells if the data connection with id is already registered to the data connection manager.

BOOLEAN DataConnManager::RegisterDataConn (  DataConnProfileId  id  ) 
 

Registers the data connection specified by profile id to the data connection manager. The method returns TRUE if the data connection was registered successfully. Registering fails if the data connection is already registered, or if the ID of the given profile doesn't exist or cannot be retrieved, or if an out of memory condition occurs.

Returns:
Success of operation.

BOOLEAN DataConnManager::UnregisterDataConn (  DataConnProfileId  id  ) 
 

Unregisters the data connection specified by profile id from the data connection manager. The method returns TRUE if the data connection was unregistered successfully. If the data connection is currently active, then the data connection gets released first. The method blocks until unregistering is finished. Unregistering fails if no data connection with profile id is currently registered.

Returns:
Success of operation.
